articles.summary: Benzinga: Crypto Makes Christmas Wish Lists As Inflation Forces Americans To Rethink Holiday Spending. In the face of rising inflation, American consumers are increasingly interested in receiving cryptocurrency as Christmas gifts, according to a recent survey conducted by Visa Inc. What Happened: The report highlighted the shift in consumer behavior in the wake of escalating living costs. Despite inflation eating into disposable income, the desire for digital assets as gifts is on the rise.
